Title:               Personal Consumption Expenditures Excluding Food and Energy (Chain-Type Price Index)
Series ID:           PCEPILFE
Source:              U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis
Release:             Personal Income and Outlays
Seasonal Adjustment: Seasonally Adjusted
Frequency:           Monthly
Units:               Index 2012=100
Date Range:          1959-01-01 to 2020-03-01
Last Updated:        2020-04-30 7:50 AM CDT
Notes:               BEA Account Code: DPCCRG
                     A Guide to the National Income and Product Accounts of the United
                     States (http://www.bea.gov/national/pdf/nipaguid.pdf) (NIPA).
